name: 楊士萱
objective:
一、歐規數位電視（DVB-T/H）簡介
二、影音訊號簡介
三、影音訊號壓縮原理
四、Reed-Solomon 錯誤更正碼
五、H.264視訊編解碼
六、HE AAC v2 音訊編解碼
七、數位電視之傳輸串流
八、解碼MPE/MPE-FEC
九、解碼RTP/RTCP
十、解碼FLUTE/SDP
schedule:
Week 1 　　Intro to the course and digital TV (2)
Week 2 　　DVB-H Overview (3)
Week 3 　　Video Basics (3)
Week 4 　　Principles of Video/Audio Compression (3)
Week 5 　　H.264 Video Coding (part 1) (3)
Week 6 　　H.264 Video Coding (part 2) (3)
Week 7 　　Psychoacoustics, fundamentals of signal processing (1,2)
Week 8 　　MPEG-2 advanced audio coding (3)
Week 9 　　HE AAC V2 (3)
Week 10 Mid-term (3)
Week 11　　Sol to MT, Introduction to Reed-Solomon Codes (2,1)
Week 12　　Algebra for Reed-Solomon Codes (3)
Week 13　　Berlekamp-Massey Decoding of Reed-Solomon Codes (3)
Week 14　　RS Codes in DVB-H, system implementation of DVB-H receiver (1,2)
Week 15 MPEG-2 system (TSP/PAT/PMT/INT) (3)
Week 16 MPE/MPE-FEC/IP/UDP/RTP/RTCP/ time slicing (3)
Week 17 FLUTE/ESG/SDP/lip sync (3)
Week 18 Final exam
